meta.content: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of June 14 article about Fiorello H La Guardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts

block.p: An article on June 14 about the Fiorello H. La Guardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts referred imprecisely to the school's alumni office. Although the Alumni and Friends of La Guardia Inc. is allowed to use an office inside the school, it is a separate tax-exempt organization that is independent of the school, and donations it receives go to the organization, not to the Board of Education.

An article on June 14 about the Fiorello H. La Guardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts referred imprecisely to the school's alumni office. Although the Alumni and Friends of La Guardia Inc. is allowed to use an office inside the school, it is a separate tax-exempt organization that is independent of the school, and donations it receives go to the organization, not to the Board of Education.
